## Variable types
- Numerics
  - Doubles
  - Integers
  - Mathematical operators
  
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

data.frame(
  a = rep(10, 7),
  b = rep(3, 7),
  operator = c('+', '-', '*', '/', '^', '%/%', '%%')
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    ex = paste(a, operator, b),
    result = ex %>%
      map(rlang::parse_expr) %>%
      map(eval) %>%
      unlist() %>%
      round(3) %>%
      formatC(digits = 3, format = 'f', drop0trailing = T)
  ) %>%
  select(-a, -b) %>%
  knitr::kable(
    col.names = c('Operator', 'Expression', 'Result'),
    align = 'c')
```
